channel.title: How do I make my client downloadable?
channel.description: How do I take my client (not server) files and put it on something like Mediafire? I have Teamviewer

item.title: How do I make my client downloadable?
item.dc:creator: @chocothunda chocothunda
item.description:
@chocothunda wrote:

The best one is www.multiupload.com. That uploads it to like 7 different sites for your members to chose from automatically. The best part is, is that it’s free.

Read full topic
item.source: How do I make my client downloadable?

item.title: How do I make my client downloadable?
item.dc:creator: @revengr revengr
item.description:
@revengr wrote:

attk mast3r:

(i recommend uppit, mediafire, or rapidshare)

Uppit and Rapidshare are both awful.

Uppit is horribly slow, and is just annoying, so your much better off with mediafire or megaupload.
Rapidshare REQUIRES you to make an account so you can have over 10 downloads, which is ridiculous, when Mediafire and Megaupload don’t require them at all.

Read full topic

item.title: How do I make my client downloadable?
item.dc:creator: @wiz1166 wiz1166
item.description:
@wiz1166 wrote:

just sayin, if u dont want leachers of your client then make sure u have made a copy of your client and delete the .jar files on one copy and then you can use winrar to compress the file. For winrar, just go to google and search it up. Then use a good uploader like uppit.com

Hope that helped…

Read full topic
item.source: How do I make my client downloadable?

item.title: How do I make my client downloadable?
item.dc:creator: @attk_mast3r attk mast3r
item.description:
@attk_mast3r wrote:

dont listen to hippo he obveously dosn’t know what he is saying, what yu do is right click on the file and click on ADD TO (file name) and once it is done being compressed into a rar folder yu go to any file hosting site (i recommend uppit, mediafire, or rapidshare)

NOTE: to get a free rapidshare accoutn (so it can be downloaded more than 10 tmes) yu must upload it and scroll down and click on make free account then make the account and upload it again.

Read full topic
item.source: How do I make my client downloadable?

item.title: How do I make my client downloadable?
item.dc:creator: @hippo429 hippo429
item.description:
@hippo429 wrote:

Well, you should have winrar. double click your client and hit compress and email (just close the email thing that pops up) and tada! now its compressed just go to example www.megaupload.com make an acount and go to home then its all there. it needs to be compressed before it can be uploaded on there.

Read full topic
